item.description:
Come down to the Branford Green and start the summer off with this wonderful concert!

Vonda Shepard's career has ranged in scope from early hits in the late '80s with “Don't Cry Ilene” (Reprise Records) and “Can’t We Try” (with Dan Hill) to her work as an independent artist, and then as the voice of Ally McBeal, selling more than 12 million records worldwide throughout the span of the hit TV show.

Her magnificent new CD From the Sun finds her indie roots firmly planted. Infusing her deep and melodic songwriting style with splashes of powerful vocals, her album is described as “modern-day soul” with Vonda’s solid piano playing and soulful, blues-inspired voice driving the tracks.

The Historic Town Green is transformed into a festival of crafts, activities, food, live music and much, much more. http://www.branfordfe...

Bring your wine, an appetizer or dessert to share and your lawn chair and settle in for a great evening of music. Concert starts at 8:45 but we will meet at 7:00 to give people a chance to get acquainted or reacquainted! Should be a nice way to start off this summer of concerts!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Vonda Shepard Concert at Branford Fest
